title: Significant amount of lag on OCE servers?
body: So I was excited to go play some games with the new update but I entered a game with a consistent 200 ping and I noticed a lot of others players were experiencing high amounts of lag as well over a few games. Is this anything to do with the server?

replies.body: ha don;t hold your breath for a decent response from riot . i did a support ticket on this and they came back with it must be a problem with your system which it isn't as i have never had a problem till their stupid serve change was meant to help which it didn't really . they also ignored the fact that my team and the enemy team were complaining of the same problem through several games . so i can save you time and answer like riot will its your fault nothing to do with them . typical i know
It could have something to do with your ISP. I'm with Telstra and the only time I get lag is when other people are using the internet.
I've been having weird lag since last night. My ping is usually fairly normal, although it has been spiking. But I've been having a lot of rubberbanding and stuff just feels less responsive.
